net.corda.node.utilities

Class ServiceIdentityGenerator

  • net.corda.node.utilities.ServiceIdentityGenerator

  • public class ServiceIdentityGenerator

    • Field Summary

      Fields

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void generateToDisk(java.util.List<? extends java.nio.file.Path> dirs, java.lang.String serviceId, java.lang.String serviceName, int threshold)
      Generates signing key pairs and a common distributed service identity for a set of nodes. The key pairs and the group identity get serialized to disk in the corresponding node directories. This method should be called before any of the nodes are started.

    • Field Detail

      • INSTANCE

        public static ServiceIdentityGenerator INSTANCE

    • Method Detail

      • generateToDisk

        public void generateToDisk(java.util.List<? extends java.nio.file.Path> dirs,
                           java.lang.String serviceId,
                           java.lang.String serviceName,
                           int threshold)

        Generates signing key pairs and a common distributed service identity for a set of nodes. The key pairs and the group identity get serialized to disk in the corresponding node directories. This method should be called before any of the nodes are started.

        Parameters:
        dirs - List of node directories to place the generated identity and key pairs in.
        serviceId - The service id of the distributed service.
        serviceName - The legal name of the distributed service.
        threshold - The threshold for the generated group class CompositeKey.Node.
